title: Sonic Frontiers - Announce Trailer
author: Sonic the Hedgehog
description:
Sonic Team presents...Sonic Frontiers, arriving Holiday 2022!

An experience like never before, accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high velocity, open-zone freedom. Battle powerful enemies as you speed through the Starfall Islands - landscapes brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, sizzling deserts and more!

Trailer music: Tee Lopes & Tomoya Ohtani
Check out Tee at: https://twitter.com/teelopesmusic
Check out Ohtani at: https://twitter.com/Ohtanitter

Check out the Frontiers' website here: https://www.frontiers.sonicthehedgehog.com

localize.title: ソニックフロンティアーズ』アナウンスメントトレーラー
